eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
ssw: TIVUMELWANE TEMAVE EMHLABA

eng: Convention establishing the Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 – reported on 8 October 2019 – approved on 6 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 - reported on 19 February 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesigunyata kusungulwa kweSikhungo lesiSikwelemitha seTesayensi yeKubuka Nekucungula ngeteTinkhanyenti (i-SKA) (Setfulwe mhla ti-18 Inyoni 2019).  (Sandluliselwa eKomidini leSigungu saVelonkhe leTemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi neTheknoloji mhla ti-19 Inyoni 2019 – kubikwe mhla ti-8 Imphala 2019– savunywa mhla ti-6 Lweti 2019) (I-NCOP: Sendluliselwa kuLikomidi leMkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe leteMfundvo Lephakeme Netetheknoloji, Temidlalo, Buciko Nemasiko mhla ti-19 Lweti 2019)- kubikwe mhla ti-19 Indlovana 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
ssw:
Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki  
yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye Nesikhungo seMave eMhlaba lesimayelana neKusetjentiswa kwelufuto ngandlelatsite kanye neTheknoloji yeKwenta Timphilo teBantfu Tibe Ncono (I-CGEB) mayelana nekusungulwa kweSikhungo seMhlaba seKusetjentiswa kweLufuto Ngandlelatsite kanye neTheknoloji yeKwenta Timphilo teBantfu Tibe Ncono (i-ICGEB) eRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika (Setfulwe mhla ti-18 Inyoni 2019) (Libandla laVelonkhe.   (Sendluliselwa kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi Netheknoloji mhla ti-19 Inyoni 2019 - kwabikwa mhla ti-5 Ingongoni 2019) (Umkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe: Sendluliselwa kuLikomidi leMkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe leteMfundvo Lephakeme Netetheknoloji, Temidlalo, Buciko Nemasiko mhla ti-19 Lweti 2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
ssw: Kusayinwa kwesivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yase-Indiya, Hulumende weRiphabliki yeNhlangano yeBhrazili kanye naHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika lesimayelana neSikhwamamali se-IBSA seKwenta Buphuya neNdlela kube Ncono (sasayinwa mhla ti-17 Imphala 2017) (seTfulwa mhla ti-18 Imphala 2019) (Libandla Lavelonkhe: Sendluliwelwe kuLikomidi Letebudlelwano Nekubambisana Kwemave Emhlaba mhla tinge-22 Imphala  2019) (Umkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi Letekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla tinge-24 Imphala 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika naHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseBangladesh lesimayelana lekulandvwa kwemuntfu eveni lakubo ayiswe eveni lente kulo bugebengu (Setfulwe mhla ti-14 Lweti 2019) (Libandla laVelonkhe: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTebulungiswa Nekulungiswa Kwesimilo mhla ti-18 Lweti 2019) (Libandla laVelonkhe: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla tinge-30 Bhimbidvwane 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika naHulumende weRiphabhliki yase Bangladesh lesimayelana neKusitana ngekweMtsetfo eTindzabeni teBugebengu (Setfulwe mhla ti-14 Lweti 2019) (Libandla laVelonkhe: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTebulungiswa Nekulungiswa Kwesimilo mhla ti-18 Lweti 2019) (Umkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla tinge-30 Bhimbidvwane 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye neNhlango yaseYurophu yeteMandla e-Athomi (i-EURATOM) seKubambisana eKusebentiseni ngeKuthula Emandla eNuzi (Setfulwe mhla ti-14 Lweti 2019) (Libandla laVelonkhe: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leteTimbiwa Nemandla mhla ti-18 Lweti 2019).

eng: MOTIONS:
ssw: TISHUKUMISO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House extends the deadline by which the Ad Hoc Committee to initiate and introduce legislation amending section 25 of the Constitution has to complete its task to 30 May 2020.
ssw: Sincumo lesiluhlaka (Sosiswebhu weLicembu Lelibusako): Sekutsi Indlu yengete sikhatsi lesingumncamulajucu sekutsi Likomidi leSikhashana licale futsi letfule umtsetfo wekuchibela sigaba se-25 seMtsetfosisekelo sekutsi iphotfule umsebenti wayo kube mhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti 2020.

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House revives the Aquaculture Development Bill [B 22 - 2018] (National Assembly –sec 76) and resumes proceedings on the Bill from the stage it reached on the last day of the sixth session of the Fifth Parliament.
ssw: Sincumo lesiluhlaka (Sosiswebhu weLicembu Lelibusako): Sekutsi Indlu ivusetele Umtsetfosivivinyo weKutfutfukisa Kufuya Tilwane neTitfombo Tasemantini [B 22 - 2018] (Libandla laVelonkhe –sigaba se-76) kanye nekucala futsi tinchubo letimayelana neMtsetfosivivinyo kuleso sigaba lebetikuso ngelusuku lwekugcina leseshini yePhalamende yeSihlanu.

eng: Consideration of Request for Approval by Parliament of Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa in terms of section 231(2) of Constitution, 1996 (Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology, see Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 73).
ssw: Kucutjungulwa kweSicelo seKuvunywa yiPhalamende kweSivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye neSikhungo seMave eMhlaba lesimayelana neKusetjentiswa kwelufuto ngandlelatsite kanye neTheknoloji yeKwenta Timphilo teBantfu Tibe Ncono (I-CGEB) mayelana nekuSungulwa kweSikhungo seMhlaba seKusetjentiswa kweLufuto ngandlelatsite kanye neTheknoloji yeKwenta Timphilo teBantfu Tibe Ncono (i-ICGEB) eRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika ngekwembandzela wesigaba se-231(2) seMtsetfosisekelo, wanga-1996 (Umbiko weLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe Letemfundvo Lephakeme, Tesayensi neTheknoloji, buka Timemetelo, Tetfulo neMibiko yeLikomidi, mhla ti-05 Ingongoni 2019, likh. le-73)

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2019/20 First Quarter financial and service delivery performance report of Department of Higher Education and Training (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 64).
ssw: Kucutjungulwa kweMbiko weLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTekutfutsa weTemfundvo Lephakeme, Tesayensi neTheknoloji lomayelana nembiko weKota Yekucala yanga-2019/20 wetetimali nekusebenta kuletsa tinsita kweLitiko Letemfundvo Lephakeme Nekucecesha (Timemetelo, Tetfulo neMibiko yeLikomidi, mhla ti-05 Ingongoni 2019, likh. le-64).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2018/19 Annual Reports of National Skills Fund and Sector Education and Training Authorities (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 24).
ssw: Kucutjungulwa kweMbiko weLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTekutfutsa weTemfundvo Lephakeme, Tesayensi Netheknoloji lomayelana neMibiko yeMnyaka wa-2018/19 weSikhwama saVelonkhe seTemakhono neMkhakha weTemfundvo neTikhungo letinemagunya eKucecesha (Timemetelo, Tetfulo neMibiko yeLikomidi, mhla ti-5 Ingongoni 2019, likh. le-24).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Second Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 4).
ssw: Kucutjungulwa kweMbiko weLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe Letekutfutsa neTekuhweba Netimboni lomayelana neKusebenta ngekweTetimali kweLitiko Letekuhweba Netimboni Netentfutfuko yeTemnotfo ngeKota yeSibili yeTetimali kanye neKungasebenti ngekweTimali kwemnyaka wetetimali wanga-2019/20 (Timemetelo, Tetfulo neMibiko yeLikomidi, mhla ti-5 Ingongoni 2019, likh. le-4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Standing Committee on Auditor-General on Integrated Annual Report of Auditor-General for financial year 2018/19 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 4 December 2019, p 3).
ssw: Kucutjungulwa kweMbiko weLikomidi leLimile leMhlolimabhuku Jikelele lomayelana neMbiko weMnyaka Lohlanganisiwe weMhlolimabhuku Jikelele wemnyakatimali wanga-2018/19 (Timemetelo, Tetfulo neMibiko yeLikomidi, mhla ti-04 Ingongoni 2019, likh. le-3).

(Sandluliselwa eKomidini leSigungu saVelonkhe leTemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi neTheknoloji mhla ti-19 Inyoni 2019 – kubikwe mhla ti-8 Imphala 2019 (Sandluliselwa eKomidini leSigungu saVelonkhe leTemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi neTheknoloji mhla ti-19 Inyoni 2019 – kubikwe mhla ti-8 Imphala 2019– savunywa mhla ti-6 Lweti 2019) (I-NCOP: Sendluliselwa kuLikomidi leMkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe leteMfundvo Lephakeme Netetheknoloji, Temidlalo, Buciko Nemasiko mhla ti-19 Lweti 2019)- kubikwe mhla ti-19 Indlovana 2020).

(Sandluliselwa eKomidini leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi Netheknoloji mhla ti-19 Inyoni 2019) (Sendluliselwa kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi Netheknoloji mhla ti-19 Inyoni 2019 - kwabikwa mhla ti-5 Ingongoni 2019) (Umkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe: Sendluliselwa kuLikomidi leMkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe leteMfundvo Lephakeme Netetheknoloji, Temidlalo, Buciko Nemasiko mhla ti-19 Lweti 2019).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
ssw: TIVUMELWANE TEMAVE EMHLABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (I-CGEB) mayelana neKusungulwa kwesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology Component (i-ICGEB) eRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika (Setfulwe mhla ti-18 Inyoni 2019) (Sandluliselwa eKomidini leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi neTheknoloji mhla ti-19 Inyoni 2019 – kubikwe mhla ti-6 Ingongoni 2019– savunywa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (I-NCOP: Sendluliselwa kuLikomidi leMkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe leteMfundvo Lephakeme Netetheknoloji, Temidlalo, Buciko Nemasiko mhla ti-19 Lweti 2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
ssw: Kusayinwa kwesivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yase-Indiya, Hulumende weRiphabliki yeNhlangano yeBhrazili kanye naHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika lesimayelana neSikhwamamali se-IBSA seKwenta Buphuya neNdlela kube Ncono (sasayinwa mhla ti-17 Imphala 2017) (seTfulwa mhla ti-18 Imphala 2019) (e-NA: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi Letebudlelwano Nekubambisana Kwemave Emhlaba mhla tinge-22 Imphala  2019) (e-NCOP: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla tinge-24 Imphala 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika naHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseBangladesh lesimayelana lekulandvwa kwemuntfu eveni lakubo ayiswe eveni lente kulo bugebengu (Setfulwe mhla ti-14 Lweti 2019) (Libandla laVelonkhe: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTebulungiswa Nekulungiswa Kwesimilo mhla ti-18 Lweti 2019 – Kubikwe mhla ti-3 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 - kwavunywa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (e-NCOP: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla tinge-30 Bhimbidvwane 2020 – kubikwe mhla ti-17 Indlovulenkhulu  2020).

Q R Dyantyi naMk. T Mahambehlala kutsi basebente njengalabasetihlalweni besikhashana eshemba ngetikhatsi tekuhlala ngekwehaybhridi (lokuhlanganisa incenye lekuchutjwa kumavidiyo nangekuchutjwa ngalokwetayelekile)  kweLibandla laVelonkhe, nakunesidzingo, kuyo yonkhe leseshini yemnyaka yanga-2020.

eng: on 25 July 2019 an Ad Hoc Committee to initiate and introduce legislation amending section 25 of the Constitution was established and mandated to complete its task and report to the House by 31 March 2020;
ssw: mhla tinge-25 Kholwane 2019 Likomidi Lesikhashana kutsi lisungule libuye futsi lingenise umtsetfo lochibela sigaba se-25 seMtsetfosisekelo lasungulwa laphindze lagunyatwa kutsi licedzele umsebenti walo liphindze futsi libike kuleNdlu kungakendluli mhla tinge-31 Indlovulenkhulu 2020;

eng: on 5 March 2020, the Assembly extended the deadline for reporting to 29 May 2020;
ssw: mhla ti-5 Indlovulenkhulu 2020, leLibandla lelula umncamulajucu wekubika lawuyisa kumhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti 2020;

eng: the Ad Hoc Committee ceased to exist on 29 May 2020 before it could complete its mandate;
ssw: leLikomidi Lesikhashana laphelelwa sikhatsi sekuba khona mhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti 2020 ngembi kwekutsi liphotfule umsebenti walo;

eng: re-establishes the Ad Hoc to initiate and introduce legislation amending section 25 of the Constitution with the same composition and powers as its predecessor (Minutes of Proceedings, 25 July 2019, p 68);
ssw: iphindze isungule kabusha leLikomidi Lesikhashana kute kutsi lisungule liphindze futsi lingenise lomtsetfo lochibela sigaba se-25 seMtsetfosisekelo lakheke ngaleyo ndlela futsi libe nalawo mandla alelo laphambilini (Emaminitsi eTinchubo, tamhla tinge-25 Kholwane 2019, likh. 68);

eng: instructs the Committee to incorporate in its work the proceedings and all the work of the previous committee up to and including 29 May 2020; and
ssw: icondzise leLikomidi lifake kulomsebenti walo tinchubo nawo wonkhe umsebenti walelikomidi laphambilini kute kube futsi kufake ekhatsi wamhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti 2020; kanye

eng: sets the deadline by which the Committee is to report to 31 December 2020.
ssw: nekuncuma umncamulajucu wekutsi leLikomidi letfule umbiko mhla tinge-31 Ingongoni 2020.

ssw: TIVUMELWANE TEMAVE EMHLABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (I-CGEB) mayelana neKusungulwa kwesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology Component (i-ICGEB) eRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika (Setfulwe mhla ti-18 Inyoni 2019) (Sandluliselwa eKomidini leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi neTheknoloji mhla ti-19 Inyoni 2019 – kubikwe mhla ti-6 Ingongoni 2019– savunywa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomidi leMkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe leteMfundvo Lephakeme Netetheknoloji, Temidlalo, Buciko Nemasiko mhla ti-19 Lweti 2019)- kubikwe mhla ti-19 Inkhwekhweti 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
ssw: Kusayinwa kwesivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yase-Indiya, Hulumende weRiphabliki yeNhlangano yeBhrazili kanye naHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika lesimayelana neSikhwamamali se-IBSA seKwenta Buphuya neNdlela kube Ncono (sasayinwa mhla ti-17 Imphala 2017) (seTfulwa mhla ti-18 Imphala 2019) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sandluliselwa kuLikomidi Letebudlelwano Nekubambisana Kwemave Emhlaba mhla tinge-22 Imphala  2019) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla tinge-24 Imphala 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye neNhlangano yaseYurophu yeteMandla e-Athomi (i-EURATOM) seKubambisana eKusebentiseni ngeKuthula Emandla eNuzi (Setfulwe mhla ti-14 Lweti 2019) (Libandla laVelonkhe: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leteTimbiwa Nemandla mhla ti-18 Lweti 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika naHulumende wase-United Mexican States lesimayelana neKusitana ngekweMtsetfo eTindzabeni teBugebengu (Setfulwe mhla ti-5 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTebulungiswa Nekulungiswa Kwesimilo mhla ti-9 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – Kubikwe mhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti 2020 - savunywa mhla ti-17 Inhlaba 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – kubikwe mhla lu-1 Inhlaba  2020).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
ssw: TIVUMELWANE TEMAVE EMHLABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (I-CGEB) mayelana neKusungulwa kwesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology Component (i-ICGEB) eRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika (Setfulwe mhla ti-18 Inyoni 2019) (Sandluliselwa eKomidini leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi neTheknoloji mhla ti-19 Inyoni 2019 – kubikwe mhla ti-6 Ingongoni 2019– savunywa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomidi leMkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe leteMfundvo Lephakeme Netetheknoloji, Temidlalo, Buciko Nemasiko mhla ti-19 Lweti 2019)- kubikwe mhla ti-19 Inkhwekhweti 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
ssw: Kusayinwa kwesivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yase-Indiya, Hulumende weRiphabliki yeNhlangano yeBhrazili kanye naHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika lesimayelana neSikhwamamali se-IBSA seKwenta Buphuya neNdlela kube Ncono (sasayinwa mhla ti-17 Imphala 2017) (seTfulwa mhla ti-18 Imphala 2019) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sandluliselwa kuLikomidi Letebudlelwano Nekubambisana Kwemave Emhlaba mhla tinge-22 Imphala  2019) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla tinge-24 Imphala 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye neNhlangano yaseYurophu yeteMandla e-Athomi (i-EURATOM) seKubambisana eKusebentiseni ngeKuthula Emandla eNuzi (Setfulwe mhla ti-14 Lweti 2019) (Libandla laVelonkhe: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leteTimbiwa Nemandla mhla ti-18 Lweti 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika naHulumende wase-United Mexican States lesimayelana neKusitana ngekweMtsetfo eTindzabeni teBugebengu (Setfulwe mhla ti-5 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTebulungiswa Nekulungiswa Kwesimilo mhla ti-9 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – Kubikwe mhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti 2020 - savunywa mhla ti-17 Inhlaba 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – kubikwe mhla lu-1 Inhlaba  2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika naHulumende wase-United Mexican States lesimayelana lekulandvwa kwemuntfu eveni lakubo abuyiswe eveni lente kulo bugebengu (Setfulwe mhla ti-5 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTebulungiswa Nekulungiswa Kwesimilo mhla ti-9 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – Kubikwe mhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti 2020 - savunywa mhla ti-17 Inhlaba 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla tin-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – kubikwe mhla lu-1 Inhlaba  2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
ssw: Umculu wase-Afrika weTelubalobalo (Wetfulwe mhla ti-5 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Libandla laVelonkhe: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemisebenti Yahulumende Nekuphatsa mhla ti-9 Indlovulenkhulu 2020)

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane neBudlelwane loBucotfo neKubambisana (i-TAC) eNingizimu yeMphumalanga ye-Eshiya (Setfulwe mhla ti-18 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi Letebudlelwano Nekubambisana Kwemave Emhlaba mhla tinge-26 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – sabikwa mhla ti-11 Inhlaba 2020 – savunywa mhla ti-17 Inhlaba 2020).

eng: MOTIONS:
ssw: TISHUKUMISO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House –
ssw: Sincumo lesiluhlaka (Sosiswebhu weLicembu Lelibusako): Sekutsi Indlu –

eng: notes that the term of office of the Auditor-General is due to end on 30 November 2020;
ssw: ibona kutsi sikhatsi sekuba sehhovisi seMhlolimabhuku Jikelele sesitawuphela mhla tinge-30 Lweti 2020;

eng: establishes in terms of Rule 253(1)(a) an ad hoc committee on the appointment of the Auditor-General, the Committee to –
ssw: isungule ngekulandzela Umtsetfo-253 (1)(a) likomidi lesikhashana lelimayelana nekukhetfwa kweMhlolimabhuku Jikelele, Likomidi kutsi –

eng: nominates a person in terms of section 193 of the Constitution for appointment as Auditor-General;
ssw: lenyule umuntfu ngekulandzela sigaba se-193 seMtsetfosisekelo ngekukhetfwa kweMhlolimabhuku Jikelele;

eng: consist of 11 members of the National Assembly, as follows: ANC 6, DA 2, EFF 1, and other parties 2;
ssw: lakhiwa ngemalunga la-11 eLibandla laVelonkhe, ngalendlela lelandzelako: e-ANC 6, e-DA 2, e-EFF 1, bese kutsi lamanye emacembu 2;

eng: exercise those powers in Rule 167 necessary to assist it in carrying out its task; and
ssw: lisebentisa lawo mandla kuMtsetfo we-167 lodzingekako kutsi lente umsebenti walo; futsi

eng: report to the House on the nomination of the Auditor-General by 31 August 2020.
ssw: libike eNdlini mayelana nekwenyulwa kweMhlolimabhuku jikelele mhla tinge-31 Ingci 2020.

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House, notwithstanding Rule 138(2), which provides for rotation of clusters for Questions to Ministers on a weekly basis as determined by the Rules Committee, mandates the National Assembly Programme Committee to make decisions regarding the combination of clusters of government portfolios and the rotation of clusters based on the determination of priorities as and when necessary for the duration of the 2020 annual session.
ssw: Sincumo lesiluhlaka (Sosiswebhu Lomkhulu weLicembu Lelibusako): Lesitsi Indlu, nanome kunjalo Umtsetfo-138(2), lovumela kutsi kube nekuntjintjantjintjana kwemaklasta eMibuto lecondziswe eTindvuneni njalo ngeliviki njengaloku kuncume Likomidi leMitsetfo, igunyate Likomidi leTinhlelo teLibandla laVelonkhe kutsi litsatse tincumo letiphatselene nekuhlanganiswa kwemaklasta etikhundla tahulumende kanye nekuntjintjantjintjana kwemaklasta ngekuya ngekuncunywa kwabomabekwembili nangabe futsi kudzingekile ngesikhatsi seseshini yemnyaka wa-2020.

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (I-CGEB) mayelana neKusungulwa kwesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology Component (i-ICGEB) eRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika (Setfulwe mhla ti-18 Inyoni 2019) (Sandluliselwa eKomidini leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi neTheknoloji mhla ti-19 Inyoni 2019 – kubikwe mhla ti-6 Ingongoni 2019– savunywa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (I-NCOP: Sendluliselwa kuLikomidi leMkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe leteMfundvo Lephakeme Netetheknoloji, Temidlalo, Buciko Nemasiko mhla ti-19 Lweti 2019)- kubikwe mhla ti-19 Inkhwekhweti 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
ssw: Kusayinwa kwesivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yase-Indiya, Hulumende weRiphabliki yeNhlangano yeBhrazili kanye naHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika lesimayelana neSikhwamamali se-IBSA seKwenta Buphuya neNdlela kube Ncono (sasayinwa mhla ti-17 Imphala 2017) (seTfulwa mhla ti-18 Imphala 2019) (e-NA: Sandluliselwa kuLikomidi Letebudlelwano Nekubambisana Kwemave Emhlaba mhla tinge-22 Imphala  2019) (e-NCOP: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla tinge-24 Imphala 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (I-CGEB) mayelana neKusungulwa kwesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology Component (i-ICGEB) eRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika (Setfulwe mhla ti-18 Inyoni 2019) (Sandluliselwa eKomidini leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi neTheknoloji mhla ti-19 Inyoni 2019 – kubikwe mhla ti-6 Ingongoni 2019– savunywa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomidi leMkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe leteMfundvo Lephakeme Netetheknoloji, Temidlalo, Buciko Nemasiko mhla ti-19 Lweti 2019)- kubikwe mhla ti-19 Inkhwekhweti 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
ssw: Kusayinwa kwesivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yase-Indiya, Hulumende weRiphabliki yeNhlangano yeBhrazili kanye naHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika lesimayelana neSikhwamamali se-IBSA seKwenta Buphuya neNdlela kube Ncono (sasayinwa mhla ti-17 Imphala 2017) (seTfulwa mhla ti-18 Imphala 2019) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sandluliselwa kuLikomidi Letebudlelwano Nekubambisana Kwemave Emhlaba mhla tinge-22 Imphala  2019) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla tinge-24 Imphala 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye neNhlangano yaseYurophu yeteMandla e-Athomi (i-EURATOM) seKubambisana eKusebentiseni ngeKuthula Emandla eNuzi (Setfulwe mhla ti-14 Lweti 2019) (Libandla laVelonkhe: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leteTimbiwa Nemandla mhla ti-18 Lweti 2019).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
ssw: Sicelosikhalo sebahlali baseKokomeng netigodzi letibomakhelwane, bacela Libandla kutsi liphenye futsi licale ngekuphindza kuvulwa kwesikolwa kwesiteshi semaphoyisa saseKokomeng (Mnu. I S Seitlholo) – (Likomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemaphoyisa – Libandla laVelonkhe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
ssw: Sicelosikhalo sebahlali baseBredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park naseGlen Marais (beliwadi le-25),  beLidolobhakati lase-Ekurhuleni, bacela Libandla kutsi liphenye ngekufadabala kwekuphakelwa kwagezi ngalokwetsembekile etindzaweni tabo (Mk. H Ismail) – (Likomidi leSigungu saVelonkhe leTekubusa Ngekubambisana Netendzabuko – Libandla laVelonkhe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
ssw: Sicelosikhalo lesibuya kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, bacela Libandla laVelonkhe kutsi liphenye ngemali yekurenta lebita kakhulu lekhokhwa bantfu labarenta tindlu telikhansela (Mk. H Ismail) – (Likomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu, Emanti Nekuhanjiswa Kwendle – Libandla laVelonkhe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
ssw: Sicelosikhalo sebahlali baseJamestown, eStellenbosch, bacela Libandla laVelonkhe kutsi liphenye kwendluliswa, lokwentiwe yi-Eskom, kwelulawulo lwemandla enethiwekhi yagezi eJamestown aye kumasipala waseStellenbosch (Dkt. L Shreiber) – (Likomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemabhizinisi aHulumende – Libandla laVelonkhe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
ssw: Sicelosikhalo lesivela kutakhamuti taseGermiston, kumasipala waseku-Ekurhuleni, ticela Libandla laVelonkhe kutsi liphenye kucishelwa gezi kanengi eGermiston (Mk. M Clarke) – (Likomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemabhizinisi aHulumende – Libandla laVelonkhe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
ssw: Sicelosikhalo lesivela kutakhamuti taseLetsitele Town, eWadi-23, eTzaneen, ticela Libandla laVelonkhe kutsi licinisekise kutsi masipala waseTzaneen uyayihlonipha imitsetfo, imitsetfo yamasipala kanye nemitsetfomgomo, nekutsi uyakufezekisa kwehlukaniswa kwetindzawo lokuncunyiwe nalokusebentako, kanye nekucaphela futsi uvimbe tonkhe tento letingekho emtsetfweni (Mk. D van der Walt) – (Likomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTekubusa Ngekuhlanganyela Netendzabuko – Libandla laVelonkhe).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
ssw: Sicelosikhalo sebalimi kanye nemmango waseTzaneen, eLimpopo, labamelwe yi-AGRI Letaba, icela Libandla laVelonkhe kutsi liphenye ngekucishelwa kwagezi emahlandla lamanyenti kakhulu, kutsikameteka kwemandla agezi, kwehla kwemavoliteji agezi kanye nekungagcinwa kwawo usesimeni lesifanele kusukela nga-2016 ngenca yekwehluleka kwaMasipala Lomkhulu waseTzaneen (Mk. D van der Walt) – (Likomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe Letekubusa Ngekuhlanganyela Netendzabuko – Libandla laVelonkhe).

ssw: TIVUMELWANE TEMAVE EMHLABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (I-CGEB) mayelana neKusungulwa kwesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology Component (i-ICGEB) eRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika (Setfulwe mhla ti-18 Inyoni 2019) (Sandluliselwa eKomidini leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi neTheknoloji mhla ti-19 Inyoni 2019 – kubikwe mhla ti-6 Ingongoni 2019– savunywa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomidi leMkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe leteMfundvo Lephakeme Netetheknoloji, Temidlalo, Buciko Nemasiko mhla ti-19 Lweti 2019)- kubikwe mhla ti-19 Inkhwekhweti 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
ssw: Kusayinwa kwesivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yase-Indiya, Hulumende weRiphabliki yeNhlangano yeBhrazili kanye naHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika lesimayelana neSikhwamamali se-IBSA seKwenta Buphuya neNdlela kube Ncono (sasayinwa mhla ti-17 Imphala 2017) (seTfulwa mhla ti-18 Imphala 2019) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sandluliselwa kuLikomidi Letebudlelwano Nekubambisana Kwemave Emhlaba mhla tinge-22 Imphala  2019) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla tinge-24 Imphala 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye neNhlangano yaseYurophu yeteMandla e-Athomi (i-EURATOM) seKubambisana eKusebentiseni ngeKuthula Emandla eNuzi (Setfulwe mhla ti-14 Lweti 2019) (Libandla laVelonkhe: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leteTimbiwa Nemandla mhla ti-18 Lweti 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
ssw: Sicelosikhalo sebahlali baseBredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park naseGlen Marais (beliwadi le-25),  beLidolobhakati lase-Ekurhuleni, bacela Libandla kutsi liphenye ngekufadabala kwekuphakelwa kwagezi ngalokwetsembekile etindzaweni tabo (Mk. H Ismail) – (Likomidi leSigungu saVelonkhe leTekubusa Ngekubambisana Netendzabuko – Libandla laVelonkhe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
ssw: Sicelosikhalo lesibuya kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, bacela Libandla laVelonkhe kutsi liphenye ngemali yekurenta lebita kakhulu lekhokhwa bantfu labarenta tindlu telikhansela (Mk. H Ismail) – (Likomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu, Emanti Nekuhanjiswa Kwendle – Libandla laVelonkhe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
ssw: Sicelosikhalo sebahlali baseJamestown, eStellenbosch, bacela Libandla laVelonkhe kutsi liphenye kwendluliswa, lokwentiwe yi-Eskom, kwelulawulo lwemandla enethiwekhi yagezical eJamestown aye kumasipala waseStellenboschl (Dkt. L Shreiber) – (Likomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemabhizinisi aHulumende – Libandla laVelonkhe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
ssw: Sicelosikhalo lesivela kutakhamuti taseGermiston, kumasipala waseku-Ekurhuleni, ticela Libandla laVelonkhe kutsi liphenye kucishelwa gezi kanengi eGermiston (Mk. M Clarke) – (Likomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemabhizinisi aHulumende – Libandla laVelonkhe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
ssw: Sicelosikhalo lesivela kutakhamuti taseLetsitele Town, eWadi 23, eTzaneen, ticela Libandla laVelonkhe kutsi licisekise kutsi masipala waseTzaneen uyayihlonipha imitsetfo, imitsetfo yamasipala kanye nemitsetfosimiso, nekutsi uyakufezekisa kwehlukaniswa kwetindzawo lokuncunyiwe nalokusebentako, kanye nekucaphela futsi uvimbe tonkhe tento letingekho emtsetfweni (Mk. D van der Walt) – (Likomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTekubusa ngeKuhlanganyela neTendzabuko – Libandla laVelonkhe).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
ssw: Sicelosikhalo sebalimi kanye nemmango waseTzaneen, eLimpopo, labamelwe yi-AGRI Letaba, icela Libandla laVelonkhe kutsi liphenye ngekucishelwa kwagezi lokukhulu, kutsikameteka kwemandla agezi, emavoliteji lamancane agezi kanye nekungagcinwa esimeni kusukela nga-2016 ngenca yekwehluleka kaMasipala Lomkhulu waseTzaneen (Mk. D van der Walt) – (Likomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leteKubusa ngeKuhlanganyela neTendzabuko – Libandla laVelonkhe).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (I-CGEB) mayelana neKusungulwa kwesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology Component (i-ICGEB) eRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika (Setfulwe mhla ti-18 Inyoni 2019) (Sandluliselwa eKomidini leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi neTheknoloji mhla ti-19 Inyoni 2019 – kubikwe mhla ti-6 Ingongoni 2019– savunywa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomidi leMkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe leteMfundvo Lephakeme Netetheknoloji, Temidlalo, Buciko Nemasiko mhla ti-19 Lweti 2019)- kubikwe mhla ti-19 Inkhwekhweti 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
ssw: Kusayinwa kwesivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yase-Indiya, Hulumende weRiphabliki yeNhlangano yeBhrazili kanye naHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika lesimayelana neSikhwamamali se-IBSA seKwenta Buphuya neNdlela kube Ncono (sasayinwa mhla ti-17 Imphala 2017) (seTfulwa mhla ti-18 Imphala 2019) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sandluliselwa kuLikomidi Letebudlelwano Nekubambisana Kwemave Emhlaba mhla tinge-22 Imphala  2019) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla tinge-24 Imphala 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye neNhlangano yaseYurophu yeteMandla e-Athomi (i-EURATOM) seKubambisana eKusebentiseni ngeKuthula Emandla eNuzi (Setfulwe mhla ti-14 Lweti 2019) (Libandla laVelonkhe: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leteTimbiwa Nemandla mhla ti-18 Lweti 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika naHulumende wase-United Mexican States lesimayelana neKusitana ngekweMtsetfo eTindzabeni teBugebengu (Setfulwe mhla ti-5 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTebulungiswa Nekulungiswa Kwesimilo mhla ti-9 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – Kubikwe mhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti 2020 - savunywa mhla ti-17 Inhlaba 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – kubikwe mhla lu-1 Inhlaba  2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika naHulumende wase-United Mexican States lesimayelana lekulandvwa kwemuntfu eveni lakubo abuyiswe eveni lente kulo bugebengu (Setfulwe mhla ti-5 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTebulungiswa Nekulungiswa Kwesimilo mhla ti-9 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – Kubikwe mhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti 2020 - savunywa mhla ti-17 Inhlaba 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – kubikwe mhla lu-1 Inhlaba  2020).

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House designates Dr M Q Ndlozi to replace Mr G A Gardee on the Magistrates Commission in terms of section 3(1)(a)(x) of the Magistrates Act (No 90 of 1993).
ssw: Sincumo lesiluhlaka (Sosiswebhu Lomkhulu weLicembu leLibusako): Sekutsi Indlu ikhetse Dkt. M Q Ndlozi kutsi angene esikhundleni saMnu. G A Gardee kuKhomishini yaBomantji ngekulandzela sigaba se-3(1)(a)(x) seMtsetfo waBomantji (Nombolo 90 wanga-1993).

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House suspends Rule 290(2)(a), which provides inter alia that the debate on the Second Reading of the Bill may not commence before at least three Assembly working days have elapsed since the committee’s report was tabled, for the purposes of conducting the Second Reading today on the Division of Revenue Amendment Bill [B 9 - 2020] (National Assembly – sec 76).
ssw: Sincumo lesiluhlaka (Sosiswebhu weLicembu leLibusako): Sekutsi Indlu imise Umtsetfo 290(2)(a), lowenta kutsi emkhatsini walokunye uyimise inkhulumomphikiswano lemayelana neKufundvwa Kwesibili kweMtsetfosivivinyo angeke kucale ngembi lokungenani tinsuku letintsatfu tekusebenta kweLibandla laVelonkhe tingakapheli kusukela umbiko welikomidi wetfulwa, ngetinhloso tekwenta Kufundvwa Kwesibili lamuhla lokumayelana neMtsetfosivivinyo weKuchibela Tekuhlukanisa Tetimalingena [B 9 - 2020] (Libandla laVelonkhe – sigaba se-76).

eng: Judicial Matters Amendment Bill [B 13B - 2019] (National Assembly – sec 75).
ssw: Umtsetfosivivinyo weKuchibela Tindzaba teMajaji [B 13B – 2019] (Libandla laVelonkhe – sigaba se-75).

eng: Prescription in Civil and Criminal Matters (Sexual Offences) Amendment Bill [B 22B - 2019] (National Assembly – sec 75).
ssw: Umtsetfosivivinyo weKuchibela teKuphelelwa Sikhatsi kweMacala Langesiwo weBugebengu neTindzaba teteBugebengu (Emacala eteMacansi)[B 22B - 2019] (Libandla laVelonkhe – sigaba se-75).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
ssw: TIVUMELWANE TEMAVE EMHLABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (I-CGEB) mayelana neKusungulwa kwesikhungo i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology Component (i-ICGEB) eRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika (Setfulwe mhla ti-18 Inyoni 2019) (Sandluliselwa eKomidini leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi neTheknoloji mhla ti-19 Inyoni 2019 – kubikwe mhla ti-6 Ingongoni 2019– savunywa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomidi leMkhandlu weTifundza waVelonkhe leteMfundvo Lephakeme Netetheknoloji, Temidlalo, Buciko Nemasiko mhla ti-19 Lweti 2019)- kubikwe mhla ti-19 Inkhwekhweti 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
ssw: Kusayinwa kwesivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yase-Indiya, Hulumende weRiphabliki yeNhlangano yeBhrazili kanye naHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika lesimayelana neSikhwamamali se-IBSA seKwenta Buphuya neNdlela kube Ncono (sasayinwa mhla ti-17 Imphala 2017) (seTfulwa mhla ti-18 Imphala 2019) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sandluliselwa kuLikomidi Letebudlelwano Nekubambisana Kwemave Emhlaba mhla tinge-22 Imphala  2019) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla tinge-24 Imphala 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye neNhlangano yaseYurophu yeteMandla e-Athomi (i-EURATOM) seKubambisana eKusebentiseni ngeKuthula Emandla eNuzi (Setfulwe mhla ti-14 Lweti 2019) (Libandla laVelonkhe: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leteTimbiwa Nemandla mhla ti-18 Lweti 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika naHulumende wase-United Mexican States lesimayelana neKusitana ngekweMtsetfo eTindzabeni teBugebengu (Setfulwe mhla ti-5 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTebulungiswa Nekulungiswa Kwesimilo mhla ti-9 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – Kubikwe mhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti 2020 - savunywa mhla ti-17 Inhlaba 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – kubikwe mhla lu-1 Inhlaba  2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane lesisemkhatsini waHulumende weRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika naHulumende wase-United Mexican States lesimayelana lekulandvwa kwemuntfu eveni lakubo abuyiswe eveni lente kulo bugebengu (Setfulwe mhla ti-5 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTebulungiswa Nekulungiswa Kwesimilo mhla ti-9 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – Kubikwe mhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti 2020 - savunywa mhla ti-17 Inhlaba 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – kubikwe mhla lu-1 Inhlaba  2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
ssw: Umculu wase-Afrika weTelubalobalo (Wetfulwe mhla ti-5 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Libandla laVelonkhe: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi leLibandla laVelonkhe leTemisebenti Yahulumende Nekuphatsa mhla ti-9 Indlovulenkhulu 2020)

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020).
ssw: Sivumelwane neBudlelwane loBucotfo neKubambisana (i-TAC) eNingizimu yeMphumalanga ye-Eshiya (Setfulwe mhla ti-18 Indlovulenkhulu 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwe kuLikomidi Letebudlelwano Nekubambisana Kwemave Emhlaba mhla tinge-26 Indlovulenkhulu 2020 – sabikwa mhla ti-11 Inhlaba 2020 – savunywa mhla ti-17 Inhlaba 2020) (Umkhandlu waVelonkhe weTifundza: Sendluliselwa kuLikomdi leTekuvikeleka Nebulungiswa mhla tinge-29 Inhlaba 2020).
